# Todd Dinehart

![](https://www.ci.woodland.wa.us/sites/g/files/vyhlif12716/files/styles/directory_listings_body_with_photo/public/media/bc/image/711/todd_dinehart_-_blue.jpg?itok=Wqb8yP-w "todd_dinehart_-_blue.jpg")

Position

Mayor

Phone Number

360-225-8281, ext 606

Email

[Email](https://www.ci.woodland.wa.us/email-contact/node/4457/field_email "Email Todd Dinehart (opens in a new window)")

Office Hours

By appointment only

Profile

Elected for a four year term.

[Print](https://www.ci.woodland.wa.us/print/pdf/node/4457)
